pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing METAR Weather Reports // Allows to download current and historical METAR weather reports extract and parse basic parameters and present main weather information. Current reports are downloaded from Aviation Weather Center https://www.aviationweather.gov/metar and historical reports from Iowa Environmental Mesonet web page of Iowa State University ASOS-AWOS-METAR http://mesonet.agron.iastate.edu/AWOS/.
